newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mostly firmer, gas oil easy.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mostly firmer, gas oil easy.

text.p: NWE oil products were mostly steady to firmer with only gas oil taking a break from recent gains.
Naphtha prices were steady to firmer. Buying interest was quite strong, but still pretty relaxed and trade was thin.
Gasoline was steady to a touch firmer. A Rotterdam refiner who has been covering all week payed up to $210 a tonne for Rotterdam refinery material but later sold barges at $211.
Gas oil eased as a holiday in the key Geramn market stifled buying and IPE futures retraced some of Wednesday's sharp gains.
High sulphur cracked fuel oil barges were around $1 a tonne firmer but cargo prices were stable.
